s_synopsis: A powerful crime syndicate has taken over large areas of our major cities, turning them into vast criminal wastelands. Arson, extortion, drug distribution and now... terrorist abduction! You've just learned they've taken the President's daughter and are holding her and the country hostage. You've had a GUTFULL! Your purpose: to wipe out this criminal organization and rescue the President's daughter. Even with the most sophisticated assault technology available, it won't be easy. Can you save the country from this sinister infestation?
